committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: A bill to provide that payments for military retired pay shall be made by the Civil Service Commission and that appropriations for such purpose shall be made to the Civil Service Commission.

summary.text: States that beginning with fiscal year 1983, military retired pay shall be paid by the Civil Service Commission and that appropriations for such payments shall be made to the Commission. Directs the Secretary of Defense and the Chairman of the Civil Service Commission to issue jointly such regulations as may be required to effectuate the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that payments for military retired pay shall be made by the Civil Service Commission and that appropriations for such purpose shall be made to the Civil Service Commission.
